name: GIFT BLOX
description:
Ever wondered how Santa gets all his gifts in the bag?

Well... he doesn't.

Help Santa stack all 99 gifts into one, steady tower, so he can take those gifts and safely get them to their destinations, obeying all laws of physics known to mankind! Because that's what Santas do.

A lofi 64x64 demake of a game the past, Tower Bloxx. Made for the PICO-8 Advent Calendar 2020. Stay home, stay safe, play games and have fun! <3
